pr_title: Reformat old database classes and reorganize liquibase files

timeline.message: Feat(Database): Remove old liquibase files and move migration scripts to database sub-project
Fix(Java): Remove final from method parameters in alert-database
Fix(Liquibase): Keep old changelogs for the sake of upgrades, but move new changelogs to alert-database
